short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent spoilers on web pages by filtering out specified terms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚫🔍 Spoiler Stopper: Your Ultimate Web Spoiler Shield! 🛡️🌐

Ever stumbled upon a spoiler that ruined your favorite show or the big game? Say no more! Spoiler Stopper is here to safeguard your web experience against unwanted spoilers. With our innovative extension, you're the master of your browsing domain, free from the fear of unexpected spoilers.

🏒 No More Spoiled Games: Eager to watch the Vancouver hockey match later but the internet is rife with results? Just add "Canucks" to your Spoiler list, and we’ll cover those spoilers up for you.

📺 Keep TV Shows a Surprise: Can't watch "90 Day Fiance" tonight? Add "90 Day" to your list and browse worry-free. We'll ensure the suspense stays intact.

🗳️ Avoid Political Spoilery: Overwhelmed by constant political news? Simply add the last names of the candidates to your list and filter out the noise.

🚫📱 Social Media Timeout: Find yourself mindlessly scrolling social media when you shouldn't? Add site names to your list for a gentle nudge, giving you a second chance to stay focused.

🎵 Rickroll-Proof Your Browsing: Tired of being Rickrolled? Add "Rickrolled", "Rick rolled", and "Astley" to your list. We've got your back!

Spoiler Stopper is incredibly easy to set up. Just make sure the icon is visible by pinning it in the upper right-hand corner of your browser. Click the icon anytime to manage your list of spoiler terms.

Your web, your rules! 🌐✨ With Spoiler Stopper, you’re always in control. Download now and enjoy a spoiler-free browsing experience!

A quick note about privacy: This extension keeps all of data locally, on your computer.
